data.name: Nowhere: Mysterious Artifacts
data.detailed_description:
First Chapter: Enigma of the Root Mountains


Nowhere: Mysterious Artifacts Survival & Horror Game Set in September 1993, the first episode begins with four friends searching for an artifact. They have no difficulty in realizing that something is wrong here, this is the site of the Root Experiment mentioned in conspiracy theories. There is only one thing left for the rest, to survive and not to be afraid if it is possible...

Survival is all that matters




Build a shelter. Discover a place that has survived in this world and develop it. Make living conditions more livable. Protect yourself and protect your friends against dangers. But don't forget your sanity and health while doing all this.

Seamless Wheather Change Conditions



Our game's unique weather variations give players unique chances to create their own advantage in challenging conditions. The cycle of day and night interferes with the entire Enemy elements in the game. Environment design and anomalies are all affected by this system.

Solo and Coop


In Nowhere, you can explore and survive as a lone wolf, or you can experience the whole adventure in coop with your four friends

Join our Discord Channel


Join us on Discord! We share our progress. We also take to time to discuss with you, to listen up to your ideas and suggestions. Join us now!
https://discord.gg/UxPst2mpdN

data.short_description: Nowhere is a Multiplayer survival horror game for up to four players set in the Middle of Unknown. You can craft, You can Build, and You can discover disturbing secrets about the first chapter of the game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This section is completely relative and this information will be updated as a result of the tests close to the release of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: This section is completely relative and this information will be updated as a result of the tests close to the release of the game.
